title: New study reshapes understanding of how the brain recovers from injury

title_detail.value: New study reshapes understanding of how the brain recovers from injury

summary: Each year, approximately 265,000 Americans have a stroke that causes visual impairment. New research sheds light on how the damage in the brain caused by a stroke can lead to permanent vision impairment. The findings could provide researchers with a blueprint to better identify which areas of vision are recoverable, facilitating the development of more effective interventions to encourage vision recovery.
